name: FrontDoorMotion
0:
”Alexa, open front door motion.”
”Alexa, ask front door motion to say a phrase”
”Alexa, ask front door motion to give me a phrase.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: front door motion
des:
When the skill is opened it will recite a random phrase from a list, then will close. The Skill automatically closes so there is no need to close it after the routine is run.

List of phrases:
 What in the world did you order now?
 You've got a package.
 Hide...someone's at the door.
 Elvis has left the building.
 Hot chick in the house.
 Let's get this party started.
 Who invited you?
 The perimeter has been breached, release the dog.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
